news_header: A school shooting in Sweden resulted in 11 deaths, including the shooter, with unclear motives and victims randomly selected.
news_original_title: Poliisi kertoi Örebron kouluampumisen kulusta: Epäilty ampui 70 laukausta
news_text: In a tragic school shooting in Sweden on February 4, 11 people died, including the shooter, who killed himself shortly after the incident began. The shooter fired 70 shots and was previously registered at the school. The police are still investigating the motive, which remains unclear, and believe the victims were randomly selected. Most victims were foreign-born.
